title: NASA Launched and Landed LOFTID, an Inflatable Flying Saucer Heat Shield
description: The LOFTID mission tested a novel approach to guiding spacecraft through the extreme heat of returning from orbit, which could be used to put people on Mars.
dc:creator: Kenneth Chang
media:description: An artistâ€™s concept of LOFTID, which is designed to survive falling into the atmosphere at more than 18,000 miles per hour and temperatures over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
